titleStmt.title: An extract translated out of the French copie and taken out of the registers of the French kings priuie councell.
titleStmt.author: France. Conseil du roi.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling on Adling hill, neere Carter-lane,

notesStmt.note: Judicial decree in the appeal of John Potter and other English cloth merchants in a dispute with the Company of Drapers of Rouen.-- Cf. STC (2nd ed.)
"Done in the privie Councell of the King, holden at Paris, the one and twentieth day of Aprill, 1600. subscribed thus, Desbaigneaulx."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
